column17:
Adorn your interiors with this wall clock from Blacksmith. The clock boasts the Sydney design and comes with an extra set of hands. The clock is 12 inches in diameter and is crafted from fabricated aluminium sheet.

Features
  • Type: Wall Clock
  • Colour: Mustard
  • Diaplay: Analogue
  • Design: Sydney design
  • Size:12 inches
  • Material: Fabricated Aluminium Sheet

Care Tips
Clean With a soft dry cotton cloth.
